subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
Vuelta a Espana (Bicycle Race)
lead_paragraph: Daniel Moreno of Spain won a mountainous, 106-mile fourth stage of the Vuelta a España to move 43 seconds behind the new overall leader, Sylvain Chavanel of France.
snippet: Daniel Moreno of Spain won a mountainous, 106-mile fourth stage of the Vuelta a España to move 43 seconds behind the new overall leader, Sylvain Chavanel of France.
